hgr::ParticleSystem::Description Class Reference

#include <ParticleSystem.h>

Inheritance diagram for hgr::ParticleSystem::Description:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Description of a particle system.

Description objects are shared between all instances of the same particle effect. Normally this class is not used directly by the user as particle systems are loaded from scripts.


Public Types

enum  { MAX_PARTICLES_LIMIT = 65535/6 }

Member Data Documentation

int hgr::ParticleSystem::Description::emissionMaxParticles
 

Maximum number of particles.

See MAX_PARTICLES_LIMIT.

math::Domain hgr::ParticleSystem::Description::particleEndAlpha
 

Value domain for particle end transparency random (scalar) variable.

1 is opaque.

math::Domain hgr::ParticleSystem::Description::particleEndColor
 

Value domain for particle end color random (3-vector) variable.

(1,1,1) is white.

math::Domain hgr::ParticleSystem::Description::particleSpriteElasticity
 

Value domain for particle elasticity random (scalar) variable.

Good values 0-0.2, but out-of-range values can create interesting effects.

math::Domain hgr::ParticleSystem::Description::particleStartAlpha
 

Value domain for particle start transparency random (scalar) variable.

1 is opaque.

math::Domain hgr::ParticleSystem::Description::particleStartColor
 

Value domain for particle start color random (3-vector) variable.

(1,1,1) is white.

int hgr::ParticleSystem::Description::textureFrames
 

Number of texture frames embedded to the texture bitmap in NxN grid.

Must be square of integer.
